summary: Learn about .SCRIV files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: SCRIV files are used for storing screen plays, papers, novels, and scripts for movie, television, and stage plays.
NOTE: You can save Scrivener documents to an XML format using the .SCRIVX extension.

description: Document created by Scrivener, a writing studio used for composing novels, research papers, and scripts; saves the written text, layout structure, and outline of the document; also enables writers to save a conceptual layout of ideas alongside the written content.
